mapper.select: select * from wangka order by price
select * from wangka where name like concat('%',#{name},'%') order by price
select * from wangka where price <50 order by price
select * from wangka where price >=50 and price <100 order by price
select * from wangka where price >=100 and price <400 order by price
select * from wangka where price >=400 order by price
select * from wangka where one =#{one} order by price
select * from wangka where two like concat('%',#{two},'%') order by price
select * from wangka where three like concat('%',#{three},'%') order by price
select * from wangka where four =#{four} order by price
